additional_info: v 1.8 February 24, 2014 - refined gradient, removed legacy -webkit prefix as caniuse.com indicates that browser support for unprefixed linear-gradient has been in Firefox since 16, Chrome since 26, and Safari since 6.1. If you are using something older you need to update. added background for album cover slides. added background replacement for help.pandora.com, but a bug in help.pandora.com or Stylish Chrome extension is stopping the stylesheet from being injected for me on Chrome 35. toggling disable/enable in Stylish toolbar button triggers stylesheet injection, and stylesheet gets injected normally in Firefox 29. will revisit on next update.
